titleStmt.title: Pian piano, or, Intercourse between H. Ferne, Dr. in divinity and J. Harrington, Esq. upon occasion of the doctors censure of the Common-wealth of Oceana.
titleStmt.author: Ferne, H. (Henry), 1602-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
